channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- Firefox ESR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- Firefox ESR

item.title: CVE-2021-38493|2024-08-04T01:44:22.825Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20esr
item.description: Mozilla developers reported memory safety bugs present in Firefox 91 and Firefox ESR 78.13. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort some of these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 78.14, Thunderbird < 78.14, and Firefox < 92.

item.title: CVE-2024-2616|2024-07-05T17:21:11.755Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20esr
item.description: To harden ICU against exploitation, the behavior for out-of-memory conditions was changed to crash instead of attempt to continue. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 115.9 and Thunderbird < 115.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-2616|2024-03-19T12:02:58.997Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20esr
